review:
Karma Incarnation 1, dunque, è un primo episodio promettente che omaggia le vecchie avventure grafiche in modo semplice ma efficace.
Il sistema canonico del genere a cui appartiene, pur essendo solido, ha tratto beneficio dall’aggiunta delle novità introdotte da AuraLab. e saremmo felici se lo studio decidesse di ampliarle ulteriormente nei capitoli successivi, velocizzando altresì movimenti e animazioni così da mantenere un ritmo di gioco accettabile.
Bene sia per il comparto grafico che per il sonoro, capaci di conferire al titolo un’atmosfera stramba e contemporaneamente fiabesca.
Se amate i punta e clicca “al naturale” come Samorost, qui troverete tutta la spontaneità e la purezza del caso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013697341', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1477004997}
review:
The beauty of the art style is evident to anyone, so I will not dwell on that.
While it is impossible to not be reminded of the Amanita Design games, this doesn't feel like a rip-off. And while the textures are not as polished, the flow of movement from the characters is lovely and particularly well done. And the music score is great as well.

Some mechanics (like being good and evil) could have been implemented better, the save system is far from good, autosaves and lets you replay huge chunks of the game if you want to try out handling affairs differently. Also it should be mentioned that this is part 1 of the story.

All in all I had a blast playing it. If the pictures and trailer get you, you probably will not be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992873944', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1500669514}
review:
Karma Incarnation 1 is a beautiful atmospheric point and click adventure.
One which truly is a piece of psychedelic art. I love the hand drawn art, and simple yet effective animation style.
This makes the game stand out even more.
I did not encounter any major bugs, other then some graphical glitches some places, one when using astral projection in the dancing scene, the huge guy with the chain glitches.
It can be alittle hard to move sometimes, and i would like to see a option to skip certain long animations.
What else is there to say if you love adventure games, dont mind point and click then this game is one of the best.
Very immersive & pretty atmospheric game. I am a indie dev myself, and have a greenlit atmospheric similar 2D game coming out on steam, so this is also very inspiring for me.
I recommend this game to anyone who loves a trippy and atmospheric journey through the world of Karma!

author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1477137254}
review:
Ну и зaeбeнили же разработчики квест вроде и не чего так, решаем задачи, получаем за это бонусы, улучшаем своего червячка-полудракончика, проходим игру и наслаждаемся,.. Ну тут не так все просто, добавили в игру еще и целую историю об инкрнации духа Пипа, который должен сыграть в карму и целью его становится спасение не только своей любви, но и премирению цылых народов и спасение мира. 

Качественно прорисованный и необычный мир, в котором и предстоит взамимодействовать с окружающими вашему герою. Разговаривать с цветком или камнем? Пожалуйста!... Но только в игре нет текстовой или аудио информации, все диалоги в игре производятся графически. 

Данная игра подарит вам интересный игровой гемплей, необычный сюжет с трогательной историей, множество как легко так и не очень решаемых игровых заданий, достижения стим которые добыть будет не совсем уж и легко и коллекционные карточки из которых вы сможете создать себе значек и получить такие же необычные смайлы и фоны для профиля как и сама игра.

Я вот пока писал данный обзор все думал: с чем же можно сравнить данную игру - да не с чем! Karma есть Karma, и все тут! Уникальный квест который пойдет на ура всем любителям квестов со множеством задач)

review:
[h1] A Glorious Way To Reincarnate[/h1] 

This game reminded me of Machinarium mixed with Limbo. It is set in a very odd yet attractive world. Psychedelic animation and engaging memorable heroes stands this game out from the others. One should also mention an amazing music and subtle humour. 

At its heart, Karma is a love story with a classic damsel in distress, and a brave worm Pip that should find his way to reincarnate as a dragon and rescue his love. Player as Pip can use his very special astral sight that opens him additional possibilities.

Almost every action in the game can be done in two ways. Good deeds purify Pip's karma and evil deed does the opposite. Quite an interesting idea that makes you to try the game again once you passed it.

I'd like if I could cancel animation in some episodes, but other than that it was truly a pleasure to play demo version and I am so glad that the game is now available on steam.

I nominated this game for the "WOOO HOO" award, hope it wins :)
